T02D2972:48a-0: @48a * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2972:48a-1: cho 'phrul sna tshogs bsgrub ste bsgrub bya sna tshogs
T02D2972:48a-2: skrag par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang
T02D2972:48a-3: ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par 'phags pa
T02D2972:48a-4: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rnal 'byor du bya
T02D2972:48a-7: bstod pa dang tshogs mi ltar rigs par bsags la /
T02D2972:48a-8: rdza'i ga'u legs par so btang ma thag gzhan du
T02D2972:48a-9: long ma spyad pa'i nang du rta khra bo'i rngams
T02D2972:48a-10: rgyu byas la bag zan gyis dril te sbrul rab
T02D2972:48a-11: tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs tshon sna tshogs pas ji ltar
T02D2972:48a-12: 'dod pa bzhin du bsgyur la 'o ma dang khrag
T02D2972:48a-13: bsres pa la sngags 'di zhag bdun du sgrub pa
T02D2972:48a-14: byas na / de 'gul nus pa'i dus na dgra'i
T02D2972:48a-15: khyim du btang na rab tu skrag cing brgyal bar
T02D2972:48a-17: aom badzra p'a ni phu n'a ga he tu pra
T02D2972:48a-18: shag sv'a h'a zhes pas sgrub pa po de ltar
T02D2972:48a-19: sdig pa dang spal ba dang /
T02D2972:48a-20: klu sna tshogs kyi gzugs gang 'dod pa gong ltar byas pas nges par 'grub bo //
T02D2972:48a-21: gcan gzan sder mo can gyi tshogs bsgrub na de
T02D2972:48a-22: nyid kyi sha khrag dang spu dang dbang po lnga
T02D2972:48a-23: las gzugs bag zan dang bsres la ji ltar 'dod
T02D2972:48b-0: pa'i tshon gyis bsgyur la gzugs de @48b nyid khar
T02D2972:48b-1: btu gdangs pa mche ba gtsigs pa bya'o //
T02D2972:48b-2: de gang 'dod pa'i gzugs de shing zom du bcug la kha shing leb kyis bcad la /
T02D2972:48b-3: sngon dmar gyis bcings la zhag bdun sngags 'di bzlas
T02D2972:48b-4: te khrag sna tshogs la bzlas la de dag la
T02D2972:48b-5: gtig go // aom nam shtsanda badzra p'a na yi
T02D2972:48b-6: sho dha pra wa pi ti gha ta ya shva
T02D2972:48b-7: ra na h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes bzlas te 'gul
T02D2972:48b-8: nus pa'i dus na gris sngon dmar gtubs te /
T02D2972:48b-9: gza' chen po rgyu ba'i dus su bsgrub bya'i khyim du btang na /
T02D2972:48b-10: nges par skrag cing ma rungs par nges so //
T02D2972:48b-11: gshog pa can gyi tshogs sgrub pa ste /
T02D2972:48b-12: bsgrub bya skrag par 'dod na gang 'dod pa'i sha
T02D2972:48b-13: khrag dang sbu dang gshog pa g-yas pa'i spu rtse
T02D2972:48b-14: rnams phye mar byas la bag zan dang bsres la
T02D2972:48b-15: gang 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la de nyid spus lus
T02D2972:48b-16: mgo mjug brgyan pa bse'i ga 'u'i nang du bcug
T02D2972:48b-17: la phag nag po'i ko bas gtums la gza' gang
T02D2972:48b-18: du 'jug pa'i ngos su kha bstan te /
T02D2972:48b-19: sngags 'di gzhan gyi tshig gis bar mchod par bzlas so //
T02D2972:48b-20: ma h'a yaksha badzra ka ka ya pa dyi h'um
T02D2972:48b-21: h'um zhes lan bdun bsgrubs na bsgrub bya de skrag
T02D2972:48b-22: ste ma rungs par nges so //
T02D2972:48b-23: byol song phal pa yang tshan can sgrub ste /
T02D2972:48b-24: bsgrub bya'i sems lus dag skrag par 'dod na gang
T02D2972:48b-25: bsgrub pa'i mig g-yas pa dang rmig pa'i rtse mo
T02D2972:48b-26: dang sbu dang ras dmar po'i khu ba dang /
T02D2972:48b-27: 'bru sna bcu gsum gyi phye ma dang bsres la
T02D2972:48b-28: gang 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la spyi bor seng ldeng
T02D2972:48b-29: gi phur bu sor bzhi pa btab la sa'i dong
T02D2972:48b-30: gru gsum pa'i nang du bcug la /
T02D2972:48b-31: bsri shing gis bcad la ske nas rgyu zhags kyis btab ste /
T02D2972:48b-32: bdag nyid kyis bzung la sngags 'di la zhag dgu bzlas so //
T02D2972:48b-33: aom badzra bi d'a ra ti ra ti sv'a li
T02D2972:48b-34: ske mam ske mam sv'a h'a zhes bzlas nas rgyu
T02D2972:48b-35: ma 'gul ba'i tshe gza' srang nas thon pa dang
T02D2972:48b-36: bstun nas / bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskyal na snga ma ltar 'grub par nges so //
T02D2972:48b-37: 'gal ba skrag par byed pa'i las sna tshogs pa'i
T02D2972:48b-38: cho ga 'gal ba me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba
